original_text: Now it came to pass in the seventh month, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah the son of Elishama, of the seed royal, and the princes of the king, even ten men with him, came unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah; and there they did eat bread together in Mizpah.
korean_text: 일곱째 달에 왕의 종친 엘리사마의 손자요 느다냐의 아들로서 왕의 장관인 이스마엘이 열 사람과 함께 미스바로 가서 아히감의 아들 그다랴에게 이르러 미스바에서 함께 떡을 먹다가

sentences.original_text: Now it came to pass in the seventh month
that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah
the son of Elishama, of the seed royal
and the princes of the king
came unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam
and there they did eat bread together
